products.title: Nutritional yeast flakes
products.description: An excellent source of vitamins and minerals with unique cheese-like flavor. Gluten-free, rich in B complex vitamins, protein, selenium, zinc, and folic acid. May be used in soups, pasta, sandwiches, salads, stews, as well as for preparing vegan cheese.
benefits: Extremely rich in proteins (up to 50.4g protein per 100g product)
Rich source of B-complex vitamins, including vitamin B12
Source of all essential amino acids
products.ingredients: Nutritional yeast

products.title: Plant-based sour cream
products.description: Our sour cream is a fermented product based on plant fat, soy protein and pea fiber. Suitable for vegan diet, or those on non-dairy products diet, but who crave the well known taste.
benefits: Can be used for both savory and sweet dishes
products.ingredients: Water, soy, soy protein, vegetable oil (palm), pea fiber, acidity regulator (glucono-delta-lactone), fermentation culture

products.title: Tempeh
products.description: Tempeh is a highly nutritious and tasty protein product prepared from fermented soybeans that ensures instantly feeling full. An excellent choice for those looking to reduce or eliminate animal-based foods from their diet. Served with vegetables, or cereals, or as addition to sandwiches. One of the few plant-based products that contain vitamin B12. Requires cooking prior to use.
benefits: Rich in plant proteins and fiber
products.ingredients: Soy 98%, starter culture (Rhizopus Oligosporus)

products.title: Fried tempeh
products.description: A product prepared by fermentation of thermally processed soybeans with the addition of special type of fungi. High in nutritional and energy value. One of the very few plant-based products that contain vitamin B12. Great side to vegetable dishes ensuring feeling full longer. An ideal meat substitute.
products.ingredients: Soy 98%, non-hydrogenated vegetable oil (sunflower), starter culture (Rhizopus Oligosporus), sea salt

products.title: Fried seitan
products.description: Seitan is a dish prepared from wheat protein (gluten), rich in calcium, vitamin B complex, and protein (33%), that can almost entirely replace the meat in daily diet. Seitan dishes are prepared the same way as meat dishes. It can be used as addition to vegetable dishes or as meat substitute for steaks.
products.ingredients: Water, wheat gluten, wheat flour, sea salt, spice blend, non-hydrogenated vegetable oil (sunflower)

products.title: Smoked tofu
products.description: Naturally smoked and dried, with exquisite taste and pleasant aroma, making it a healthier alternative to smoked cheese. Great as protein addition to sandwiches, and ready meals, salads, appetizers, or vegetable soups. Requires no cooking, ready for consumption.
products.ingredients: Soy 59%, water, magnesium chloride (nigari), sea salt

products.title: Fried tofu
products.description: Fried tofu cheese makes an excellent choice for those who want a healthy meal, but lack the time for preparing it. Requires no cooking, ready for consumption. It just takes a few minutes for chopping it up and tossing it over a salad, vegetables, or cereals, such as millet or buckwheat.
products.ingredients: Soy 58%, water, non-hydrogenated vegetable oil (sunflower), magnesium chloride (nigari), sea salt

products.title: Extra firm tofu
products.description: Tofu is a low-calorie soy product, plant-based, cholesterol-free, casein-free, and lactose-free. Mild in flavor, prepared with original Nigari coagulant, suitable for various dishes. Healthy, easily digestible, rich in protein, iron, calcium, and magnesium. Requires cooking prior to use.
benefits: Rich in iron, calcium, and magnesium
products.ingredients: Soy 60%, water, magnesium chloride (nigari), sea salt

products.title: Almond butter
products.description: With 100% almonds, and no additives, it contains unsaturated fatty acids, a great source of vitamin E, iron, calcium, and magnesium, as well as high protein content. May be used as a spread, an ingredient in sauces and dressings, as well as desserts. Almonds in this butter are stone-ground.
products.ingredients: Almonds 100%

products.title: Peanut butter
products.description: 99.5% peanut butter, and 0.5% sea salt. Peanuts contain high percentage of B complex vitamins, and vitamin E, as well as iron, magnesium, and potassium. Known for their low glycemic index, peanuts help maintain stable blood sugar levels. May be used as any spread.
products.ingredients: Peanuts 99.5%, sea salt 0.5%

products.title: Tahini – sesame butter
products.description: Tahini is prepared by grinding roasted sesame seeds that play a significant role in reducing cholesterol levels, and are rich in calcium, iron, manganese, copper, vitamins B1, B3, E, and protein. Tahini is the basic ingredient in preparing hummus, and may be used in dressings, sauces, and desserts.
benefits: Source of calcium, iron, and fiber
products.ingredients: Sesame 100%

products.title: Pumpkin seed butter
products.description: 90% pumpkin seeds. A rare source of nutrients with protein content similar to that of legumes and some types of meat, as well as unsaturated fatty acids. Rich in zinc, iron, potassium, calcium, manganese, selenium, phosphorus, B complex vitamins, beta carotene, and vitamin E. May be used as a spread or an ingredient in cereal porridge, sauces, and dressings.
benefits: Source of zinc, iron, and fiber
products.ingredients: Roasted pumpkin seeds (pepitas) 90%, non-hydrogenated vegetable oil (sunflower), soy lecithin, sea salt

products.title: Hazelnut butter
products.description: With 100% hazelnuts, and no additives, it contains monounsaturated fatty acids, vitamins, and minerals. With delicate flavor and extraordinary texture, this spread may be used as an ingredient in sauces, and dressings, as well as desserts. Hazelnuts in this butter are stone-ground.
benefits: Source of many micronutrients and fiber
products.ingredients: Hazelnuts 100%

products.title: Smoked deli meat
products.description: Smoked roasted deli meat is a high-protein product with at least 33% protein derived from peas and wheat. Smoked on beech wood, this roasted plant-based deli meat may be consumed as is, and also makes a great addition to various dishes.
products.ingredients: Water, wheat protein, pea protein, pea fiber, non-hydrogenated vegetable oil (sunflower), corn starch, sea salt, yeast extract, ginger, paprika, garlic, tomato powder, spice blend, flavoring

products.title: Burger
products.description: A gluten-free veggie burger, an ideal substitute for the classic burger. It stands out with its unique blend, texture, and taste. Hand mixed ingredients, including pea protein, offer the true burger eating experience. Contains 15% protein, 8.5% carbohydrates, and 17% fat.
products.ingredients: Water, soy protein isolate, sunflower oil, pea protein, hydrolyzed soy protein, potato starch, sea salt, thickeners (methyl cellulose, microcrystalline cellulose), garlic powder, onion powder, dextrose, beet powder, yeast extract, paprika extract, tomato powder, spices, flavoring

products.title: Soy sausages
products.description: Tasty meal containing an ideal combination of wheat and soy. A great addition to daily nutrition and an essential ingredient to plant-based diet. Requires no cooking.
benefits: Source of high-quality plant proteins (16.9g protein per 100g product)
Traditional taste in a healthier version
products.ingredients: Water, soy 32%, wheat gluten, acidity regulator (glucono-delta-lactone), yeast extract, dried paprika, garlic, sea salt, spice blend

products.title: Spicy soy sausages
products.description: A delicious meal with small oil content, with an ideal combination of wheat and soy. The spicy flavor will delight all true gourmets. An exquisite addition to daily nutrition as a part of healthy breakfast or dinner, a side to vegetable dishes, an ingredient in moussaka, and salads. Requires no cooking.
benefits: Source of high-quality plant proteins (16.9g protein per 100g product)
Traditional taste in a healthier version
products.ingredients: Water, soy 32%, wheat gluten, non-hydrogenated vegetable oil (sunflower), hot paprika, acidity regulator (glucono-delta-lactone), yeast extract, dried paprika, garlic, sea salt, spice blend

products.title: Oil-free soy sausages
products.description: Tasty oil-free meal containing an ideal combination of wheat and soy. A great addition to daily routine and an essential ingredient to plant-based diet. Suitable for those on oil-free diet. Requires no cooking.
benefits: Source of high-quality plant proteins (22.3g protein per 100g product)
Traditional taste in a healthier version
products.ingredients: Water, soy 32%, wheat gluten, acidity regulator (glucono-delta-lactone), yeast extract, dried paprika, garlic, sea salt, spice blend

products.title: Hot dog
products.description: Just as juicy and tasty as the "real" thing, though infinitely healthier. Ideal for making sandwiches, as a side to vegetable dishes, an ingredient in moussaka, and salads. An authentic experience of enjoying terrific taste of a plant-based hot-dog, with less saturated fat acids than the traditional hot-dog.
benefits: Less saturated fatty acids compared to meat products
products.ingredients: Water, non-hydrogenated vegetable oil (sunflower), soy protein, potato starch, thickeners (Purified sea algae Eucheuma, konjac gum, xanthan gum) yeast extract, methyl cellulose, microcrystalline cellulose, sea salt, spice blend, flavoring, beet juice concentrate powder

products.title: "Chick" dog
products.description: Juicy, spicy plant-based sausages, perfect for any barbecue! No artificial additives, rich in protein, “chick“ dog is an ideal addition to any meal. Enjoy the true taste, plant-based!
benefits: Less saturated fatty acids compared to meat products
products.ingredients: Water, sunflower oil, pea protein, modified starch, plant fiber, sea salt, methyl cellulose, sea algae eusheuma extract, konjac gum, xanthan gum, maltodextrin, spices and spice extracts, enzymes, flavorings, citric acid, preservative (potassium sorbate)

products.title: Deli meat
products.description: Full-flavored deli meat, salami like, ideal for sandwiches, salads, and quick meals. Rich in protein and artificial additives free, Gen!e Plant-Based Deli Meat is a healthier alternative for anyone seeking taste without compromise.
benefits: Less saturated fatty acids compared to meat products
products.ingredients: Water, sunflower oil, pea protein, bean protein, modified starch, plant fiber, sea algae eusheuma extract, konjac gum, xanthan gum, sea salt, maltodextrin, spices and spice extracts, flavorings, citric acid, preservative (potassium sorbate)

products.title: Tofu spread natural
products.description: Versatile soy spread for all those who prefer plant-based diet, tasty, dairy-free, and nut-free. Delicious as a spread on pastry, great on sandwiches, pasta, or as pizza topping. Its high plant protein content ensures feeling full longer.
benefits: Can be used as a sauce, dressing, or meal addition
products.ingredients: Tofu (soy, water, nigari) 60%, soy protein, sunflower oil, corn starch, apple vinegar, garlic, sea salt, mustard

products.title: Tofu spread with sesame
products.description: A plant-based soy cream with added sesame. Great as a sandwich spread, salad dressing, or canapé decoration. Fans of sesame will enjoy this spread, especially those who prefer plant-based diet.
benefits: Can be used as a sauce, dressing, or meal addition
products.ingredients: Tofu (soy, water, nigari) 60%, soy protein, sunflower oil, corn starch, apple vinegar, sesame 6%, garlic, sea salt, mustard

products.title: Tofu spread with peanut butter
products.description: A delicious and nutritious spread suitable for variety of uses. Rich in flavor, an excellent choice as a spread on sandwiches, or a dip for fresh fruits, vegetables, or whole-grain crackers. Lactose-free, dairy-free, contains no animal products.
benefits: Can be used as a sauce, dressing, or meal addition
products.ingredients: Tofu (soy, water, nigari) 60%, peanut butter, soy protein, sunflower oil, corn starch, apple vinegar, garlic, sea salt, mustard

products.title: Tofu spread with dill
products.description: This plant-based soy product makes a great spread on sandwiches, and may be used as salad dressing, or canapé decoration. Fans of dill will enjoy it tremendously. Great for all with preference for plant-based diet.
benefits: Can be used as a sauce, dressing, or meal addition
products.ingredients: Tofu (soy, water, nigari) 60%, soy protein, sunflower oil, corn starch, apple vinegar, dill 4%, garlic, sea salt, mustard

products.title: Tofu spread with peppers
products.description: This plant-based soy cream makes a healthy and easy meal. Added peppers give a vibrant color to this tofu natural spread. May be served on a piece of toast, crunchy bread, crackers or with fresh veggies.
benefits: Can be used as a sauce, dressing, or meal addition
products.ingredients: Tofu (soy, water, nigari) 60%, soy protein, sunflower oil, corn starch, apple vinegar, paprika 5%, garlic, sea salt, mustard

products.title: Oil-free tofu spread
products.description: Versatile soy spread for all those who prefer plant-based diet, tasty, oil-free, dairy-free, and nut-free, with a hint of sesame seed flavor. Delicious as a spread on pastry, great on sandwiches, pasta, or as pizza topping. Its high plant protein content ensures feeling full longer.
benefits: Can be used as a sauce, dressing, or meal addition
products.ingredients: Tofu (soy, water, nigari) 65%, soy protein, corn starch, apple vinegar, sesame, garlic, sea salt, mustard

products.title: Hummus
products.description: Creamy blend of chickpeas, lemon juice, and sesame paste. A great source of quality protein, plant fiber, iron, vitamin C, folate, and vitamin B6. An excellent spread on bread/pita bread, on sandwiches, or as a dip with fresh vegetables.
benefits: Can be used as a sauce, dressing, or meal addition
products.ingredients: Chickpeas (raw chickpeas) 70%, sesame butter, non-hydrogenated vegetable oil (sunflower), apple vinegar, sea salt, garlic, pepper
